law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 36, effective August 1, 1988. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 4, effective July 1, 1958. -- Amended 1956 (2d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 4. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Bond, form, amount and conditions -- New bond to be executed, when -- Hearing and notice on sufficiency of bond -- Discharge of surety.
